mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article( articleTitle, articleContent, articleTags, articleType, summary, customTypeId, userId) VALUES (#{articleTitle},#{articleContent}, #{articleTags},#{articleType}, #{summary},#{customTypeId},#{userId})
mapper.select: select * from article where id > #{id} order by id limit 0,1;
select * from article where id < #{id} order by id desc limit 0,1;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM article WHERE id=#{id} AND userId=#{userId}
mapper.update: update article set customTypeId=#{customTypeId}, articleType=#{articleType}, articleTitle=#{articleTitle}, articleContent=#{articleContent}, customTypeId=#{customTypeId}, articleTags=#{articleTags}, summary=#{summary} WHERE id=#{id} AND userId=#{userId}
update article set customTypeId=#{customTypeId} WHERE userId=#{userId} and id=#{id};
mapper.select: select * from article WHERE userId=#{userId} ORDER BY id desc limit #{num}
select count(*) FROM article WHERE userId=#{userId}
select * from article ORDER BY id desc
SELECT * FROM article ORDER BY id desc LIMIT #{num}
select * from article WHERE id=#{id} and userId=#{userId};
